item.title: Stevie Nicks Postpones Shows After Fracturing Shoulder
item.description: “Stevie looks forward to seeing everyone soon and apologizes to the fans for this inconvenience,” she wrote in an Instagram post.

item.title: Stevie Nicks Fractures Shoulder, Reschedules Tour Dates: ‘Apologies to the Fans for This Inconvenience’

item.title: ‘Buckingham Nicks,’ Lindsey and Stevie’s Pre-Fleetwood Mac Album, to Finally Receive Reissue After Being Out of Print Nearly Five Decades

item.title: Stevie Nicks and Lindsey Buckingham’s Only Studio Album Gets Upcoming Reissue and Digital Release
item.description: The 1973 album ‘Buckingham and Nicks,’ has been remastered for its CD and a digital debut, which will arrive this September.
